scripts.build: spago build && parcel build src/extension/manifest.json --no-content-hash --no-source-maps --dist-dir distribution --no-cache --detailed-report 0 --target webext-prod
scripts.dev: spago build && parcel build src/extension/manifest.json --no-content-hash --no-source-maps --dist-dir distribution --no-cache --detailed-report 0 --target webext-dev --no-optimize
scripts.dist:chrome: npm run build && ln -s ./distribution/webext-prod chrome_online-chess-enhancement-suite && zip chrome_online-chess-enhancement-suite_`cat ./src/extension/manifest.json | jq -r .version`.zip -r chrome_online-chess-enhancement-suite && rm chrome_online-chess-enhancement-suite
scripts.dist:zip-src: touch oces.zip && rm oces.zip && zip oces.zip -r * -x 'distribution/*' 'local/*' 'node_modules/*' 'output/*' 'web-ext-artifacts/*' 'docs/*.mp4' '*.zip' 'chrome_*/*' 'oces/*' '*.xpi'
